p1: None of our success would have been possible without generous sponsors like you. Thank you again for your dedication and kindness. When you sponsor with your money for those most in need, surrounded by enemies of Islam and Muslims...
p2: When you sponsor those chosen by Allah as martyrs, your generosity is multiplied. You support their missions and their families in goodness â€” for they have already fought.
p3: If a woman fed a thirsty dog, Allah appreciated her act and forgave her. So what about those who feed and support the oppressed as they defend Islam and its sanctities? Today, we ease the way for your support to reach Gazaâ€™s people in the north and south.
p4: You may never know how much your contribution helps the people of Gaza. It may be one of the good deeds that grants you Paradise.
comment_one: This campaign truly speaks to my heart. It's inspiring to see so many people come together for such a meaningful cause. Keep up the great work!
success_msg: Support successful. Thank you for your kindness!
faild_msg: An error occurred during support. Please try again.
